Ability.Name: 1 - Init
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Variables & Sanity checks ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- PQInterface is an absolute requirement from now on. if not IsAddOnLoaded("PQInterface") then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CPQInterface is required to run this profile!|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CThe profile has been stopped.|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_StopRotation() end
-- Load LUA data files. if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false
-- Load LUA files if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_DarkSpoon_Data.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_Broseph_Data.lua - Make sure it's in your Data folder! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_PQI.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_PQI.lua - It's required to run the profile! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
--Check player is 90 if UnitLevel("player") ~= 90 then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffff0000This rotation is designed for level 90s only!|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cffff0000I won't stop the rotation, but you use it at your own risk if you continue!|cffffffff", "Warning") end
--Check player is a pally (shouldn't be necessary, but you never know) if UnitClass("player") ~= "Paladin" then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffff0000Don't be silly, you aren't a Paladin :P|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_StopRotation() end
--Check spec is holy if GetSpecialization("player") ~= 1 then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffff0000This rotation is designed for |cffFFDB3DHoly|cffff0000 Paladins. You should change your spec!|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_StopRotation() end
--Load variables BUFF_BOK = BUFF_BOK BUFF_BOM = BUFF_BOM BUFF_SOI = BUFF_SOI NumInGroup = 0 GroupType = nil

Ability.Name: 2 - Buffs
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------ --- Blessings --- ------------------------------------------------ local _,_,_,_,_,_,_,caster = UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) if not UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) then CastSpellByID(BUFF_BOK) elseif UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) and caster ~= "player" and not UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOM) then CastSpellByID(BUFF_BOM) end
------------------------------------------------ --- Seals --- ------------------------------------------------ if GetShapeshiftForm("player") ~= 3 then CastSpellByID(BUFF_SOI) end

Ability.Name: 3 - Healing
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------ --- Do some vars --- ------------------------------------------------ local _,_,_,_,_,_,_,caster = UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) if not UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) then CastSpellByID(BUFF_BOK) elseif UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOK) and caster ~= "player" and not UnitBuffID("player",BUFF_BOM) then CastSpellByID(BUFF_BOM) end
------------------------------------------------ --- Seals --- ------------------------------------------------ if GetShapeshiftForm("player") ~= 3 then CastSpellByID(BUFF_SOI) end
